document_data.name: Sollus Duncirc
document_data.mainbody: '''Sollus Duncirc''' was a city guard Captain of the [[Flaming Fist]] mercenary company in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century DR, Sollus Duncirc was stationed in the [[Baldur's Gate/Upper City|Upper City]], near the [[Watchful Shield (shrine)|Watchful Shield]] of [[Helm]] and the [[Purple Wyrm Inn and Tavern]]. He greeted adventurers seeking employment with a welcoming demeanor, offering them directions to the Purple Wyrm, where there were adventuring jobs on offer. On behalf of the city of [[Baldur's Gate]], Sollus Duncirc offered reward for monster extermination jobs in the [[Baldur's Gate/Sewers|Sewers]] of the Gate, where [[ooze]]s, [[giant rat]]s, [[otyugh]]s, [[giant beetle]]s, and other carrion beasts bread like wildfire.
